summary:
Hello everybody
This is a follower that adds a new follower made to use bows and fight from a distance.
But you can give her a dagger or sword if you like.
descriptionHtml:
Hello ladies and Gentleman

This is a follower mod. Her name is Anaril.

[b][u]Story[/u][/b] 
Anaril was secretly personally hired by nocturnal in secret to carry out secret tasks. She has not been in contact with nocturnal for a few years and dezires to go on adventures.

[b][u]Info[/u][/b]
She can be married. 

She uses a ebony bow and ebony arrows.

She has nightingale armor.

She can be found in the Temple of Divines in Solitude.
[u][b]
Important[/b][/u]
You need Apache hairs for females and Apachii hairs.

[u]Install[/u]
1) Extract the zip to a temporary location.
2) Go into the extracted folder drag the Anaril Follower.esp into local disk c/ program Files x86/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/data then place here.

Special thanks to Apachii for giving me permission to use his hair mods
author: Cutesie
